players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana was found dead, any suspects? Thoughts?"
Bob: "Charlie is the detective, Alice & I discussed. Be cautious of both."
Charlie: "Investigated Bob, confirmed mafia. Watch him closely."
Charlie: "Bob discussed mafia role with me. Keep an eye on both Charlie and Bob."
Bob: "Observing Alice & Charlie, stay alert."
You: "Thanks for the info, focusing on Bob & Charlie. Let's work together to catch the mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Diana was found dead, any suspects? Thoughts?"
You: "Charlie is the detective, Alice & I discussed. Be cautious of both."
Charlie: "Investigated Bob, confirmed mafia. Watch him closely."
Charlie: "Bob discussed mafia role with me. Keep an eye on both Charlie and Bob."
You: "Observing Alice & Charlie, stay alert."
Alice: "Thanks for the info, focusing on Bob & Charlie. Let's work together to catch the mafia."

Day 1 begins.
